title: Ashley & Jared Return to ‘Paradise’
description:
This week on “Bachelor Happy Hour,” Ashley and Jared stop by to share all the details from their trip back to “Paradise”! In their chat with Becca and Michelle, Dawson’s parents reveal what spending time in Mexico meant for their relationship, which couple they thought had insane chemistry off the bat, and who they really hope finds love at the end of all this.   

Plus, Michelle shares what it’s like to watch her exes search for love on the beach, and the crew discusses whether an engagement is necessary for a great experience in “Paradise.” 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
